Vehicle

      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type Vehicle 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> TollBooth.vehicleList
      The vehicleList attribute is an ArrayList of objects of the class Vehicle.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Vehicle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vehicle TollBooth.getIndexVehicleList(int index)
      The getIndexVehicleList gets the object at the specified index of the ArrayList called vehicleList.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Vehicle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> TollBooth.getVehicleList()
      The getVehicleList method is a getter for the ArrayList called vehicleList.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Vehicle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TollBooth.addToVehicleList(Vehicle car)
      The addToVehicleList method adds an object to a new index in the ArrayList called vehicleList.
      void TollCollection.axles(Vehicle car)
      The axles method calculates the change in the toll for a vehicle based on the number of axles it has.
      void TollStation.countBooths(TollCollection calculate, TollStation station, TollBooth booth, Vehicle car)
      The countBooths method takes input from the booths.txt file and uses that input to create TollBooth objects in the ArrayList called tollBoothList, then runs methods to count the number of vehicles at each booth and calculate the tolls collected by each booth, then outputs the toll amounts to the console and to the output file.
      void TollBooth.countVehicles(TollStation station, Vehicle car, TollCollection calculate)
      The countVehicles method takes input from the numvehicles.txt file and uses that input to create Vehicle objects in the ArrayList called vehicleList, then runs methods to calculate the toll for each vehicle object in the ArrayList.
      void TollCollection.payTypes(Vehicle car)
      The payTypes method calculates the change in the toll for a vehicle based on the type of payment the driver used.
      void TollCollection.vehicleTypes(Vehicle car)
      The vehicleTypes method calculates the change in the toll for a vehicle based on the type of vehicle it is.
